instruction: Please review the performance of industry factors and ESG exposures for the third quarter and provide an analysis of how these findings will impact our investment strategy moving forward.
output: Upon review of the third quarter performance, we have observed a reversal in performance for industry factors, particularly within the energy and aerospace and defense sectors. As a result, we will need to adjust our investment strategy to avoid significant GICS sector exposures and focus on enhancing our ESG exposures to generate significant active industry returns. We will continue to monitor these trends closely and make adjustments as needed to maximize returns while minimizing risk.
